Title: Amends the definition of "newspaper"
Summary: Amends the definition of "newspaper"; deletes provisions of law requiring "newspaper" to include paid circulation.
LawCode: Amd ยง102, Lim Lil L; amd ยง60, Gen Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the limited liability company law and the general construction law, in relation to the definition of "newspaper"
